All Classes

  • Class Description
    CircularHitbox
    A class used to simulate the physics and interactions of circular hitboxes.
    GameSettings
    A class that stores data about the game's settings.
    GeneralUtils
    A class used to perform many miscellaneous operations.
    Hitbox
    An interface for hitboxes.
    HitboxAligner
    A class used to align hitboxes.
    HorizontalAlignment
    An enumeration containing values of different types of horizontal alignments.
    IGame
    An interface containing a tick and render method which are necessary to make a functioning game.
    ImageObject
    A class containing a Hitbox and BufferedImage property.
    InputSystem
    A class used to get user input.
    MouseButtonType
    An enumeration containing values of mouse button types.
    MouseInput
    A class that automatically updates the information in the InputSystem class.
    MouseInteraction
    A class that stores data about a mouse interaction.
    NeonEngine
    The the main class for the Neon Game Library.
    OSType
    An enumeration containing values of different types of operating systems.
    RandomUtils
    A class used to generate random values.
    Rectangle
    A representation of a rectangle with a hitbox, color, and fill setting.
    RectangularHitbox
    A class used to simulate the physics and interactions of rectangular hitboxes.
    RenderSystem
    A class used to render graphics.
    SpriteSheet
    A class used to load sprites from sprite sheets.
    TextObject
    A class containing a Hitbox, String, and Font property.
    Units
    A class that converts width and height units.
    Vector2D
    A two-dimensional vector with two values: x and y.
    VerticalAlignment
    An enumeration containing values of different types of vertical alignments.
